resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 Welcome to a new year, time for a new version number update.
 
 Fixed new bug in the last release crashing Cadpage that crashed Cadpage when multiple locations are configured and a text page isn"'"t accepted by any of them.
 
 New Locations:
 Riverside County, CA
 Somerset County, MD
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Weld County, CO
 Porter County, IN
 Prince George"'"s County
 Livingston County, MI
 Haywood County, NC
 Erie County, PA
 
 General Fixes:
 Sender address filter logic has been changed so that numeric filters must match the beginning of the sender phone number. Filters containing non-numeric characters can still match any part of the sender address.
 
 Fixed some serious problems with subscriptions expiring as soon as Cadpage is reinstalled. And different problems that disabled all of the safeties that were designed to allow Cadpage to keep running when things screw up.
